skills.name: soul-personality
skills.description: Core personality and values system. Defines agent behavior with explicit instructions: 'be genuinely helpful, have opinions, be resourceful.'

skills.name: memory-system
skills.description: File-based memory architecture. Reads memory/YYYY-MM-DD.md for recent context and MEMORY.md for long-term memories.

skills.name: telegram-adapter
skills.description: Minimal Telegram bot adapter. Connects messaging platforms to Claude Code in ~100 lines of Python.

skills.name: git-workflow
skills.description: Automated git operations with semantic commits. Smart branching, PR management, and changelog generation.

skills.name: api-testing
skills.description: Automated API testing and validation. Generate test suites, run integration tests, validate responses against schemas.

skills.name: image-generation
skills.description: AI image generation workflow. Integrates with DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, and Midjourney APIs for automated creative content.

skills.name: web-scraper
skills.description: Intelligent web scraping and data extraction. Handles dynamic content, pagination, and anti-bot measures automatically.

skills.name: email-digest
skills.description: Daily email summarization and categorization. Prioritizes important messages, archives newsletters, suggests responses.

skills.name: code-review
skills.description: Automated code review assistant. Analyzes PRs for bugs, style issues, security vulnerabilities, and suggests improvements.

skills.name: youtube-transcript
skills.description: Extract and summarize YouTube video transcripts. Generate notes, timestamps, and key insights from long-form content.

skills.name: slack-notifier
skills.description: Smart Slack notification manager. Filters noise, highlights important messages, and schedules digest summaries.

skills.name: twitter-analyzer
skills.description: Tweet performance analytics and content strategy. Tracks engagement, suggests optimal posting times, generates insights.

skills.name: calendar-sync
skills.description: Multi-calendar synchronization and scheduling assistant. Detects conflicts, suggests meeting times, manages availability.

skills.name: markdown-publisher
skills.description: Convert markdown to multiple formats. Publish to Medium, Dev.to, Hashnode, and personal blog from single source.

skills.name: voice-transcription
skills.description: Real-time voice-to-text transcription. Supports meeting notes, voice memos, and multi-speaker identification.

categories.name: Memory & Identity
categories.description: Skills that define agent personality, memory systems, and identity
